00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "TShapeSize3DB2.hpp"
00035 #include "TMPDerivs.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 std::string TShapeSize3DB2::get_name() const
00041   { return "TShapeSize3DB2"; }
00042 
00043 TShapeSize3DB2::~TShapeSize3DB2() {}
00044 
00045 bool TShapeSize3DB2::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00046                                double& result, 
00047                                MsqError& err )
00048 {
00049   const double tau = det(T);
00050   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00051     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00052     return false;
00053   }
00054   
00055   const double f = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00056   const double g = sqr_Frobenius(adj(T));
00057   result = (f + g)/(6 * tau) - 1;
00058   return true;
00059 }
00060 
00061 bool TShapeSize3DB2::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00062                                          double& result,
00063                                          MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00064                                          MsqError& err )
00065 {
00066   const double tau = det(T);
00067   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00068     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00069     return false;
00070   }
00071   
00072   const double f = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00073   const double g = sqr_Frobenius(adj(T));
00074   result = (f + g)/(6 * tau);
00075   
00076   deriv_wrt_T = -transpose(T) * T;
00077   deriv_wrt_T(0,0) += 1+f;
00078   deriv_wrt_T(1,1) += 1+f;
00079   deriv_wrt_T(2,2) += 1+f;
00080   deriv_wrt_T = T * deriv_wrt_T;
00081   deriv_wrt_T -= 3*result * transpose_adj(T);
00082   deriv_wrt_T *= 1.0/(3*tau);
00083   
00084   result -= 1.0;
00085   return true;
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 bool TShapeSize3DB2::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00090                                          double& result,
00091                                          MsqMatrix<3,3>& wrt_T,
00092                                          MsqMatrix<3,3> second[6],
00093                                          MsqError& err )
00094 {
00095   const double tau = det(T);
00096   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00097     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00098     return false;
00099   }
00100   
00101   const double f = sqr_Frobenius(T);
00102   const double g = sqr_Frobenius(adj(T));
00103   result = (f + g)/(6 * tau);
00104   
00105   MsqMatrix<3,3> dtau = transpose_adj(T);
00106   MsqMatrix<3,3> dg = -transpose(T) * T;
00107   dg(0,0) += f;
00108   dg(1,1) += f;
00109   dg(2,2) += f;
00110   dg = T * dg;
00111   dg *= 2;
00112   
00113   wrt_T = T;
00114   wrt_T += 0.5*dg;
00115   wrt_T *= 1.0/3.0;
00116   wrt_T -= result * dtau;
00117   wrt_T *= 1.0/tau;
00118   
00119   set_scaled_2nd_deriv_norm_sqr_adj( second, 1.0/6.0, T );
00120   pluseq_scaled_I( second, 1.0/3.0 );
00121   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -1./3./tau, T, dtau );
00122   pluseq_scaled_sum_outer_product( second, -1./6./tau, dg, dtau );
00123   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second, 2*result/tau, dtau );
00124   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second, -result, T );
00125   hess_scale( second, 1.0/tau );
00126   
00127   result -= 1.0;
00128   return true;
00129 }
